revision.comment: Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/Danish.rajput1998|Danish.rajput1998]] ([[User talk:Danish.rajput1998|talk]]) to last revision by Geolodus ([[WP:TW|TW]])
revision.text:
{{wiktionary|Danish|danish|dansk}} '''Danish''' may refer to: * Something of, from, or related to the country of [[Denmark]] * A national or citizen of Denmark, also called a "Dane", see [[Demographics of Denmark]] * Danish people or [[Danes]], people with a Danish ancestral or ethnic identity * [[Danish language]], a North Germanic language used mostly in Denmark and Northern Germany * [[Danish cuisine]] * [[Danish culture]] * [[Danish pastry]], often simply called a "Danish" * [[Danish tongue]] or Old Norse, the parent language of all North Germanic languages * A member of the [[Danes (Germanic tribe)|Danes]], a Germanic tribe *[[Danish (name)]], a male given name
== See also == * [[Dane (disambiguation)]] * {{look from|Danish}} * [[List of Danes]] * [[Languages of Denmark]]
{{disambiguation}} [[Category:Language and nationality disambiguation pages]]
